QuestData.Title: Undelivered Package
QuestData.Description: < The ransacked cart has obviously seen better days. A single package remains, obscured by the spilled grain. It's addressed to Marie Davenport of Millstone Hamlet. >
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the package to Marie Davenport.
QuestData.RewardText: Ohhhh, goodness! You found my lost tea. Thank you dear!
